item.title: Microservices với NodeJS phần 12 - CRUD Server Setup
item.description: Ticketing Service Project Setup Với tickets service thì ta sẽ copy từ auth service để tiết kiệm thời gian 1. make service folder mkdir tickets 2. copy same config Copy .dockerignore, Dockerfile, package-lock.json, package.json, tsconfig.json vào tickets 3. copy same code Copy src/test/*, src/app.ts, src/index.ts 4. update package name Updae package name in package.json 5. update code Update lại code vừa copy. 6. install dependencies npm install 7. Build image eval $(minikube docker-env) docker build -t ducnguyen96/ticketing-tickets .
